actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend tax-exempt status to organizations providing dependent care for the purpose of enabling individuals to be gainfully employed.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to grant tax-exempt status to organizations providing dependent care for the purpose of enabling individuals to be gainfully employed. Requires that the services provided by such an organization must be available to the general public.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend tax-exempt status to organizations providing dependent care for the purpose of enabling individuals to be gainfully employed.
